about_the_game:
Sunaba is a 3D First and Third Person Singleplayer and Multiplayer Sandbox game centered on User Generated Content. Inspired by games such as LittleBigPlanet, Roblox, Minecraft and Garry's Mod.


FEATURES

-- Mod Support

-- An art style inspired by cartoons and anime.

-- Singleplayer and Multiplayer.

-- Highly Customizable Characters

-- Play in first and third person perspectives
detailed_description:
Sunaba is a 3D First and Third Person Singleplayer and Multiplayer Sandbox game centered on User Generated Content. Inspired by games such as LittleBigPlanet, Roblox, Minecraft and Garry's Mod.


FEATURES

-- Mod Support

-- An art style inspired by cartoons and anime.

-- Singleplayer and Multiplayer.

-- Highly Customizable Characters

-- Play in first and third person perspectives

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.5GHz Dual-Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3 Capable GPU
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: A computer from around 2007 or newer can play this game
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: 2.4-3.5GHz Quad-Core Processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan 1.2 Capable GPU
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A Computer from 2015 or newer is recommended.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 or higher
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M"
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3 Capable GPU
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal Capable GPU
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Sunaba

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.5GHz Dual-Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3 or DirectX 11 Capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: A computer from around 2007 or newer can play this game
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, or 11
  • Processor: 2.4-3.5GHz Quad-Core Processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan 1.2 or DirectX 12 Capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A Computer from 2015 or newer is recommended.

short_description: Sunaba is a 3D First and Third Person Singleplayer and Multiplayer Sandbox game centered on User Generated Content. Inspired by games such as LittleBigPlanet, Roblox, Minecraft and Garry's Mod, with an art style inspired by cartoons, and anime.
